content: Bash: cd /home/jw/code/jat && bd list --json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[] | select(.status == "in_progress") | "\(.id) \(.assignee // "unassigned") \(.title)"' | head -10

Bash: bd create "Add task image attachments with drag-drop support" --type feature --description "Add ability to attach images to tasks via drag-drop on TaskTable rows. Features: multiple image upload, cross-session persistence, thumbnail display, attachments section in TaskDetailDrawer, automatic cleanup on delete, proper drawer close behavior." --assignee BlueCoast 2>&1

feature: Add task image attachments with drag-drop support
- Add drag-drop image upload to TaskTable rows
- Support multiple image uploads per task
- Add cross-session persistence via server API
- Auto-cleanup attachments when task is deleted
- Fix drawer close behavior after delete (ondelete callback)
